00014 #ifndef PTHREADLOCK_H_
00015 #define PTHREADLOCK_H_
00016 
00017 
00018 /*! non-recursive mutex.
00019  * double lock is inhibited.
00020  * \sa XRecursiveMutex.
00021  */
00022 class XPthreadMutex
00023 {
00024 public:
00025     XPthreadMutex();
00026     ~XPthreadMutex();
00027 
00028     void lock();
00029     void unlock();
00030     //! \return true if locked.
00031     bool trylock();
00032 protected:
00033     pthread_mutex_t m_mutex;
00034 };
00035 
00036 //! condition class.
00037 class XPthreadCondition : public XPthreadMutex
00038 {
00039 public:
00040     XPthreadCondition();
00041     ~XPthreadCondition();
00042     //! Lock me before calling me.
00043     //! go asleep until signal is emitted.
00044     //! \param usec if non-zero, timeout occurs after \a usec.
00045     //! \return zero if locked thread is waked up.
00046     int wait(int usec = 0);
00047     //! wake-up at most one thread.
00048     //! \sa broadcast()
00049     void signal();
00050     //! wake-up all waiting threads.
00051     //! \sa signal()
00052     void broadcast();
00053 private:
00054     pthread_cond_t m_cond;
00055 };
00056 
00057 #endif /*PTHREADLOCK_H_*/
